text: Peter Chelsom (born 20 April 1956) is a British movie director, screenwriter, and actor. He has directed the movies Hector and the Search for Happiness, Serendipity, and Shall We Dance? ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:English movie directors Category:English screenwriters Category:English movie actors Category:Writers from Lancashire Category:Actors from Blackpool
title: Peter Chelsom
